subtitleNullable: Illuminating Insights into Rice Leaf Diseases Through Image Analysis
descriptionNullable:
Explore the intricate world of rice leaf diseases with the "Rice Leaf Disease Image Samples" dataset, a rich collection of 5932 images curated by contributor Prabira Kumar Sethy. Published on 18 July 2020, Version 1, this dataset presents a comprehensive array of visuals, encompassing four distinct types of rice leaf diseases: Bacterial blight, Blast, Brown Spot, and Tungro.

Each image in the dataset serves as a valuable sample, contributing to the understanding of these diseases. Researchers and practitioners can delve into the dataset to analyze and develop insights into the identification and classification of rice leaf diseases. The dataset is accompanied by a citation for further reference: Sethy, P. K., Barpanda, N. K., Rath, A. K., & Behera, S. K. (2020). "Deep feature based rice leaf disease identification using support vector machine," published in Computers and Electronics in Agriculture, Volume 175, page 105527. DOI: 10.1016/j.compag.2020.105527.
